SETTINGS.GlobalHint: This setting sets the default setting for all players.
SETTINGS.LocalHint: This setting overrides the world default for this client only.
SETTINGS.AdvModifierHint: When holding this modifier key, MRE will roll with advantage.
SETTINGS.DisAdvModifierHint: When holding this modifier key, MRE will roll with disadvantage.
SETTINGS.ShowRollDialogHint: When holding this modifier key, MRE will show the roll dialog, rather than skipping it.
